about_the_game:
The Journey Starts

ClashingBlades is A Free-to-play Classic 3D MMORPG. it features Fantasy-themed gameplay reminiscent of your favorite games from the early to mid-2000s. Make a character and begin your quest in an open world with no guidance.

It Gets Better

Invite your friends, create Guilds and Parties, Wage wars against other Guilds, or Participate in tournaments and weekly Siege wars for the ownership of one of Ethernia's cities.

If your Guild controls a city, your Guild master can impose a tax on every token that falls within the city's boundaries or every good that is bought or sold there; the money collected from these taxes goes into your Guild's treasury. The tokens can be taken out by the Guild Master or distributed among the Guild members.

Something about classes?


ClashingBlades uses a unique class system where you are what you wear. You don't choose a class at character creation. You select a weapon, and as you level up, you will be able to learn masteries and skills unique to your weapon, or you can switch it for another and learn a completely different mastery from what you selected on character creation.

You could only master two masteries per character, which allows you to use two different weapons. You could be a Warrior and an Archer or a Cleric and a Warrior.

That allows players to create a creative combination of skills and a brilliant PvP experience.

Game Features & Missing Features

EA currently offers the following features:  
Authentication 
Character Creation. 
PvE, PvP, quests, inventory, and all the standard MMORPG features. 
Social Features: Parties & Guilds, World Chat 
A large starter map (1024x1024) 
For the time being, a single instance server can handle up to 2000 concurrent players. 
optimized client for low-end computers.

Features missing:  
Siege battles 
City ownership (one guild owning a city). 
Battle arena for competitive PvP. 
Shops (buying and selling items). 
Player Trading 
Player Shops 
Marketplace 
Quest Chains 
Item Enchantment. 
Quest Items

The missing features list will be updated.
